item.title: Don't Break The Web
item.description: Don’t Break The Web As a web developer, I like to follow prominent people working in the web on twitter. It was there that I came across this exchange between Rich Harris, the creator of the web framework Svelte, and Jarred Sumner, the creator of the new javascript runtime Bun. Smooshgate? As much as I think people should have their own website, this exchange does highlight some of what’s great about social media.
